title: The Artifacts: A Flint Hills Story
description: Kayla buys a house in the Flint Hills town of Sycamore Falls, Kansas. The property includes a dilapidated old house out back. Within its deteriorating walls, she gains insight to the old house's past, of Sycamore Falls, and perhaps ways to help revitalize the town, which has seen better times.
author: Eric T.  Reynolds
